title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.2 - Statutory authority
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 604.2 - Statutory authority

State Regulations
(a) Section
13.09
of
the Mental Hygiene Law, grants the commissioner the power to adopt rules and
regulations which are necessary and proper to implement any matter under his or
her jurisdiction. (b) Section 94 of
article 6-A of the Public Officers Law, requires the Commissioner of OPWDD to
publish regulations governing the access to records which will ensure that the
personal privacy rights of persons on whom records are maintained are
sufficiently protected. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
604.2

Amended

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
